cats.name: Eva
cats.description: This is my cat, she hates all people except me and my wife

cats.name: Loki
cats.description: Loki is the new most severe and gloomy cat in the world, who fell in love with the Internet.

cats.name: Tardar Sauce
cats.description: Grumpy Cat, real name is Tardar Sauce. A cat who became an internet celebrity for her unusual appearance after her owner's brother posted a picture of the cat on Reddit in September 2012.

cats.name: Kouky
cats.description: Koyuki is a Japanese angry cat who looks like the true embodiment of evil.

cats.name: Colonel Meow
cats.description: The Guinness Book of Records has officially recorded that Colonel Meow with a coat length of 23 cm is the longest-haired cat in the world.

cats.name: Garfi
cats.description: If Grumpy Cat is an angry cat, then Persian cat Garfi is rather angry. Or he's obviously plotting to kill you.

cats.name: Albert
cats.description: Curly-haired evil: cat Albert, which is very similar to the evil lamb
